dct_title_s: Coal fields around Coal Bluff, Fontanet and Grant, Vigo County
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by profile. Includes map showing locations of coal fields in Vigo County, Indiana, as well as 2 geological cross sections along the north and south forks of Otter Creek and 19 stratigraphic columns for various sites. Plate XXXVI. Detached from: The coal deposits of Indiana / George Hall Ashley. In Indiana Department of Geology and Natural Resources twenty-third annual report, 1898. Indianapolis : Wm. B. Burford, 1899. Page 704.
Imprint: [Indianapolis] : [Indiana Department of Geology and Natural Resources], [1899]
dct_publisher_sm: Indiana. Department of Geology and Natural Resources
